title: why cant i post on any other board

replies.body: I believe the level for other boards is 7, and you might have just needed a quick boards level sync. Sometimes your level here doesn't update correctly with your summoner level, but posting here in H&S or using the [**Profile Syncing Tool**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool) stickied at the top should get that level updated.
